extendedInfo.description: Quran360 (Traditional Chinese) aims to bring out the contents of the Holy Quran to you and to allow you to have access to the content of the Holy Quran anywhere you go, free of charges.Quran360 (Traditional Chinese) allows you to Read the Complete Holy Quran in Arabic along with its various translations in the standard order or in the order of chapter revelation, Compare with various translations for more insights, BookMark your favorite Quranic verses easily, Search for a word in the Quran translations, Explore the Index of the Quran as in the book of An Index To The Qur'an - Harun Yahya easily, Explore various Topics in the Holy Quran and Share your favorite Quranic verse with your friends. Quran360 (Traditional Chinese) Translations currently available are Albanian, Azerbaijani, Bangla, Bosnian, Bulgarian, Chinese, Czeck, Dutch, English, Finnish, French, German, Hausa, Indonesian, Italian, Korean, Malay, Malayalam, Maranao, Norwegian, Persian, Persian, Poland, Portuguese, Romanian, Russian, Somali, Spanish, Swahili, Swedish, Tamil, Thai, Turkish, Urdu, Uzbek.Basic Features:-Read Quran-Compare Quranic translation-Bookmark Quranic verse-Search Quran translation-Index of the Quran-Topics in the Quran-Find verse in the Quran.-Copy Quranic Verse-Complete Copy Quranic Verse with Arabic-Share Quranic Verse -Sort Chapter/Surah or by order of revelation
